item.title: Defending Against OAuth-Based Attacks with Automatic Attack Disruption
item.description: In today’s digital landscape, SaaS and OAuth applications have revolutionized the way we work, collaborate, and innovate. However, they also introduce significant risks related to security, privacy and compliance. As the SaaS landscape grows, IT leaders must balance enabling productivity with managing risk. A key to managing risk is automated tools that provide real-time context and remediation capabilities to help Security Operations Center (SOC) teams outpace sophisticated attackers and limit lateral movement and damage.
